Plivo | Bangalore, India (YCombinator-2012 Batch)

Plivo was founded in 2011 by Mike and Venky and was part of YCombinator batch of 2012. Plivo is a fast-growing cloud telephony startup from Silicon Valley, backed by the same investors as Skype, Facebook, Google, Dropbox, Lyft and Airbnb. Our technology and customer-centric commitment has made us a leading company in our industry. With over 40,000 customers in over 200+ countries, our profitable business model has helped us continue to scale exponentially year after year. Whatsapp, Netflix, CallRail, Mozilla, Zomato are our much valued customers (to name a few).

TECH STACK WE USE: Golang, Django, Flask, Redis, memcache, Postgres, Celery, Dynamo DB, Hadoop, SNS/SQS, AWS lambda, Nginx, Kamailio, FreeSWITCH, SIP, WebRTC, Linux, Android, iOS, Git, AWS, Docker.
